questions.question: Which of the following is not a common  archetype in literature?

choices.answer: The hero, who is usually the protagonist in the story
The mother, who usually is very caring and emotional
The wise mentor, usually an old man often portrayed with a grey beard
The nurse, who usually hurts the patient

questions.question: What does the mood refer to in a piece of literature?

choices.answer: The general feeling the piece of writing creates within the reader
The general feelings the protagonist feels

questions.question: What is the theme in a story?

choices.answer: The lesson or message the author is trying to convey
The general feeling the author is conveying
The decor that is featured in a story

questions.question: Which of the following is not an example of figurative language?
What is an epic in literature?

choices.answer: A very long poem usually focusing on a hero
A very long story that follows  a villian

questions.question: The opposite of being concise is being
What is an Mnemonic device not?

choices.answer: An electronic device used to calculate equations
A technique used to remember something

questions.question: What is the tone in literature?

choices.answer: The attitude of a writer towards a subject
The feelings the protagonist has towards the writing
The anger a writer has towards their writing
The general feelings the reader feels about the writing

questions.question: Which is not true of the word nuance?

choices.answer: it refers to the small differences in meaning
it refers to the large differences in meaning
it refers to the small differences in expression
it refers to the small variation & complexities of the world

questions.question: Which of these is not part of the definition of the word allegory?

choices.answer: a story or poem with a hidden meaning
typically it reveals a moral or political hidden meaning
a character, place, or event that is used to deliver a broader message
a poem that is literal & usually states a lot of facts

questions.question: What is the first stage in a hero's journey?
What is the function of something?

choices.answer: the special purpose or activity for which a thing exists or is used
the feelings associated with a word
